The Government is also in close and continuing Aid to Pakistan contact with a number of concerned governments and has (Question No. 4543) made its views known to a wide cross-section of states. The Government has not considered the suspension of Mr James asked the Minister for Foreign Australia's aid to Pakistan, which is mainly in the form of Affairs, upon notice, on 29 August 1979: food aid and project aid in agriculture.
